movies.title: Batman

reviews.review: The HD is awesome! and the batman succeeds because it's rooted in real-world experiences and fears.
Maybe not quite up to the standard of the first two in the series, but deserving of a very honourable mention.

movies.synopsis: When his parents were killed, billionaire playboy Bruce Wayne relocates to Asia when he is mentored by Henri Ducard and Ra's Al Ghul in how to fight evil.

movies.title: Batman

reviews.review: Very typical 2D experience, but it is already quite fine for this movie! Recommend!
